BillingTreatment.name: BillingTreatment
BillingTreatment.description: Represents information about the billing of an order item.

BillingPolicyId.description: The billing policy that's related to the billing treatment.

Description.description: Additional details about the billing treatment.

ExcludeFromBilling.description: Required. Specifies whether any order items assigned to the treatment are excluded from billing.

IsMilestoneBilling.description: Required. Indicates whether the billing treatment is for milestone billing (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed a billing treatment indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed a billing treatment. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that the user only accessed the billing treatment or a related list view (LastReferencedDate), but not viewed the billing treatment itself.

LegalEntityId.description: The legal entity that's used to assign the treatment to order items when the parent billing policy's BillingTreatmentSelection field value is LegalEntity.

Name.description: Required. The name of the billing treatment.

Status.description: Required. The status of the billing treatment.

BillingTreatment.accessRules: the Billing Admin permission set to access this object
